SecOps360

Cyber Defense Company for Zero Trust Networks

We specialize in BlueTeam practices, we architect and develop intrusion detection systems, high interactive honeypots and full packet capture solutions for corporate and ICS networks. Our solutions, together with best of breed situatonal awareness tools provide clear micro and macro visibility into what is happening in your network
